titles.title: 418 Jesus My Sorrow Lies Too Deep (easy ok)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus my sorrow
Lies too deep
For human ministry
It knows not how
To tell itself
To any but to Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou dost remember
Still amid
The glories of
God's Throne
The sorrows of
Mortality
For they were once
Thine own

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus my fainting
Spirit brings
Its fearfulness to Thee
Thine eye at least
Can penetrate
The clouded mystery

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And is it not enough
Enough
This holy sympathy
There is no sorrow
e'er so deep
But I may bring to Thee
